header.dashboardSubtitle: Overview of your MySQL databases and recent activity
header.configSubtitle: Configure your MySQL database connection settings
header.usersSubtitle: Manage MySQL user accounts and privileges

dashboard.title: Database Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your MySQL databases and recent activity
dashboard.serverInfoDescription: General information about the connected MySQL server.
dashboard.checkConfig: Please check your database connection in Configuration

sqlEditor.title: SQL Editor
sqlEditor.subtitle: Write and execute SQL queries
sqlEditor.queryExecutionError: An error occurred during query execution.
sqlEditor.savingQueriesNotAvailable: Saving queries is not yet available.
sqlEditor.myQueryHistoryDescription: Recently executed SQL queries by you.
sqlEditor.failedToFormatForEditor: Failed to format query. Opening editor with unformatted query.

queryResultTable.noDataFound: No data found matching your filters
queryResultTable.noDataReturned: No data returned for this query.
queryResultTable.editRowDescription: Make changes to the row data. Click save when you're done.
queryResultTable.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this row? This action cannot be undone.
queryResultTable.insertRowDescription: Enter the values for the new row. Auto-increment columns will be generated automatically.
queryResultTable.cellUpdatedSuccessfully: The cell has been updated successfully
queryResultTable.rowUpdatedSuccessfully: The row has been updated successfully
queryResultTable.rowCopiedSuccessfully: The row has been copied successfully
queryResultTable.rowDeletedSuccessfully: The row has been deleted successfully
queryResultTable.name: Name

configurationPage.title: Application Configuration
configurationPage.subtitle: Configure application and database server settings
configurationPage.connectionSettingsDescription: Configure your MySQL database server connection parameters. The server address is set at login.
configurationPage.enableSslDescription: Use SSL encryption for database connections
configurationPage.allowMultipleStatementsDescription: Allow executing multiple SQL statements in one query
configurationPage.allowLocalInfileDescription: Allow LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE statements
configurationPage.systemSetupDescription: Create necessary tables for system features like query history and favorites.
configurationPage.systemInitializedSuccess: System tables have been created/updated successfully.
configurationPage.configurationSavedSuccessfully: Database configuration has been saved successfully

createDatabaseDialog.title: Create New Database
createDatabaseDialog.description: Enter the details for your new MySQL database.

createTableDialog.title: Create New Table in "{{database}}"
createTableDialog.description: Define the structure of your new table, including its name and columns.
createTableDialog.name: Name
createTableDialog.tableNameInvalidChars: Table name contains invalid characters. Only alphanumeric and underscores are allowed.
createTableDialog.atLeastOneColumnRequired: At least one column is required.
createTableDialog.columnNameInvalidChars: Column name '{{columnName}}' contains invalid characters. Only alphanumeric and underscores are allowed.
createTableDialog.onlyOnePrimaryKey: Only one primary key is allowed per table.
createTableDialog.aiColumnMustBeInt: Auto-increment column '{{columnName}}' must be an integer type.
createTableDialog.aiColumnMustBePk: Auto-increment column '{{columnName}}' must also be a primary key.
createTableDialog.lengthRequired: Length is required and must be greater than 0 for {{type}} column '{{columnName}}'.
createTableDialog.nonNullableDefaultValue: Non-nullable column '{{columnName}}' must have a default value.
createTableDialog.tableMustHavePk: A table must have at least one primary key.

databaseTablesList.tablesDescription: Browse all tables in the "{{databaseName}}" database.
databaseTablesList.viewsDescription: Browse all views in the "{{databaseName}}" database.
databaseTablesList.tablesAndViewsDescription: Browse all tables and views in the "{{databaseName}}" database.
databaseTablesList.searchFilterDescription: Search for tables or views by name.
databaseTablesList.noItemsFound: No items found matching your search.
databaseTablesList.noTablesOrViewsInDb: No tables or views in this database.
databaseTablesList.name: Name
databaseTablesList.tableTruncatedSuccessfully: All data from table '{{tableName}}' has been removed.
databaseTablesList.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the table "{{tableName}}" and all its data from the database "{{databaseName}}".
databaseTablesList.confirmTruncateDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove ALL rows from the table "{{tableName}}" in the database "{{databaseName}}". The table structure will remain.
databaseTablesList.failedToLoadTablesAndViews: Failed to load tables and views for "{{databaseName}}"

tableStructurePage.title: Table Structure: {{tableName}}
tableStructurePage.subtitle: View and manage the column definitions for "{{tableName}}" in "{{databaseName}}".
tableStructurePage.columnsDescription: Detailed definitions of each column in the table.
tableStructurePage.name: Name
tableStructurePage.atLeastOneColumnRequired: At least one column is required.
tableStructurePage.columnNameInvalidChars: Column name '{{columnName}}' contains invalid characters. Only alphanumeric and underscores are allowed.
tableStructurePage.onlyOnePrimaryKey: Only one primary key is allowed per table.
tableStructurePage.aiColumnMustBeInt: Auto-increment column '{{columnName}}' must be an integer type.
tableStructurePage.aiColumnMustBePk: Auto-increment column '{{columnName}}' must also be a primary key.
tableStructurePage.lengthRequired: Length is required and must be greater than 0 for {{type}} column '{{columnName}}'.
tableStructurePage.nonNullableDefaultValue: Non-nullable column '{{columnName}}' must have a default value.

usersPage.title: MySQL Users
usersPage.subtitle: Manage database users and their privileges.
usersPage.addingUsersSoon: Adding users will be implemented soon.
usersPage.deletingUserSoon: Deleting user {{user}}@{{host}} will be implemented soon.

userPrivilegesDialog.title: Edit Privileges: {{user}}@{{host}}
userPrivilegesDialog.description: Manage global and database-specific privileges for this user.

keyboardShortcutsDialog.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcutsDialog.description: Here are the available keyboard shortcuts to navigate and interact with the application.

exportDataDialog.title: Export Data
exportDataDialog.description: Select the format to export data from table '{{table}}' in database '{{database}}'.
exportDataDialog.noDataToExport: There is no data to export.
